title: Chicken Livers with Spinach and Fennel
ingredients: ['125g spinach, rinsed and chopped', '1 bulb fennel - trimmed, quartered and sliced', '2 tablespoons butter', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '450g chicken livers, trimmed and sliced', '125ml chicken stock', '1 teaspoon capers, chopped', '4 anchovy fillets, rinsed and chopped', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper']
